property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Spirit you control. Flying Whenever Millicent, Restless Revenant or another nontoken Spirit you control dies or deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your end step, create a Blood token for each player who lost life this turn. Whenever Strefan attacks, you may sacrifice two Blood tokens. If you do, you may put a Vampire card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a nonlegendary creature spell with flying, you may copy it, except the copy is a 1/1 Spirit in addition to its other types. Do this only once each turn. (The copy becomes a token.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He sees a flicker of Avacyn's grace in every wingbeat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ward - Discard a card. Whenever another nontoken Vampire you control dies, you may pay {1} and exile it. If you do, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying. It gains "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and return the exiled card to the battlefield tapped."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.) Other Spirits you control have melee. Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to Spirits you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The library of Moormanor had been open to all before the Travails, and it continues to attract curious visitors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of opponents who control more lands than you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The honored dead who lie in blessed grafs are not easily stirred, but the threat of eternal night called many from their rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Timin, Youthful Geist (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Timin into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Vigilance Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, put a +1/+1 counter on Rhoda, Geist Avenger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Each of them is a 1/1 Spirit with flying in addition to its other types. Exile Storm of Souls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Devotion does not end with death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose up to three target permanent cards in graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control. You draw a card for each opponent who controls one or more of those permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Spirit spells as though they had flash. Whenever you cast a creature spell during an opponent's turn, tap up to one target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Worse than the obscuring mists are the ghastly faces that appear in the glow of spectral lanterns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Ethereal Investigator enters the battlefield, investigate X times, where X is the number of opponents you have. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each creature card revealed this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's 1/1, it's a Spirit in addition to its other types, and it has flying. If no creature cards were revealed this way, return Haunting Imitation to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw X cards, then discard X cards. Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card type among cards discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a single unending moment, a hundred lifetimes of knowledge coursed through his unraveling mind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Spectral Arcanist enters the battlefield, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of Spirits you control from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Rhoda, Geist Avenger (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Rhoda into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Flying At the beginning of each combat, tap up to one target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking Vampires you control have deathtouch and lifelink. Whenever a Vampire you control dies, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lady Anje said no violence at the wedding. She never said anything about the journey there!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more Vampires you control attack, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Create a 1/1 white and black Vampire creature token with lifelink. {B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Glass-Cast Heart and thirteen Blood tokens: Each opponent loses 13 life and you gain 13 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Laurine, the Diversion (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Laurine into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Lifelink Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you gain 1 life and create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each non-Vampire creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These worthless cattle think they can sneak unnoticed into my wedding? Dispose of them." - Olivia Voldaren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Shadowgrange Archfiend enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures they control. You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures sacrificed this way. Madness - {2}{B}, Pay 8 life. (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Arterial Alchemy enters the battlefield, create a Blood token for each opponent you have. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Blood tokens you control are Equipment in addition to their other types and have "Equipped creature gets +2/+0" and equip {2}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player may discard their hand and draw cards equal to the greatest mana value of a commander they own on the battlefield or in the command zone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wedding's lavish decorations paled in comparison to the opulence of its elite guests.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Kamber, the Plunderer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Kamber into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) First strike {2}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Markov Enforcer or another Vampire enters the battlefield under your control, Markov Enforcer fights up to one target creature an opponent controls. Whenever a creature dealt damage by Markov Enforcer this turn dies, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Midnight Arsonist enters the battlefield, destroy up to X target artifacts without mana abilities, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Killing the slayers was self-preservation. The fire was just for fun.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Scion of Opulence or another nontoken Vampire you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") {R}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile X target creatures, then investigate X times. Return the exiled cards to the battlefield tapped under their owners' control at the beginning of the next end step. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose three target creature cards in your graveyard. Return two of them at random to the battlefield and put the other on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For one evening, the dueling bloodlines channeled their feuds into elaborate footwork.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Breathkeeper Seraph is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "When this creature dies, you may return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wedding Ring enters the battlefield, if it was cast, target opponent creates a token that's a copy of it. Whenever an opponent who controls an artifact named Wedding Ring draws a card during their turn, you draw a card. Whenever an opponent who controls an artifact named Wedding Ring gains life during their turn, you gain that much life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Imperious Mindbreaker is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature attacks, each opponent mills cards equal to its toughness."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Doom Weaver is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "When this creature dies, draw cards equal to its power."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Mirage Phalanx is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of this creature, except it has haste and loses soulbond. Exile it at end of combat."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash At the beginning of your upkeep, for each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ruins of the town were a notable upgrade from the wolves' forest den.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Thundering Mightmare is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Umbris, Fear Manifest gets +1/+1 for each card your opponents own in exile. Whenever Umbris or another Nightmare or Horror enters the battlefield under your control, target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a land card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return target Spirit card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She endures without Avacyn but secretly asks each soul she guides if they have seen her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose an opponent. You and that player each create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Choose an opponent. You gain 2 life for each creature you control and that player gains 2 life for each creature they control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Boreas Charger leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent who controls more lands than you. Search your library for a number of Plains cards equal to the difference, reveal those cards, put one of them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a creature spell with mana value 3 or less, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Exile target artifact. • Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet mage knew she would neither get her thermoinverter back nor have the satisfaction of exploding it herself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Custodi Soulbinders enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Custodi Soulbinders: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Will of the council - When Custodi Squire enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature is an Insect artifact creature with base power and toughness 0/1 and has indestructible, and it loses all other abilities, card types, and creature types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They had it coming." - Squire Imalia, savior of Thiswick

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though the spirits' bodies were ethereal, Agnur soon learned that their blades were quite solid - and razor-sharp.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Hallowed Spiritkeeper dies, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Hanged Executioner enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. {3}{W}, Exile Hanged Executioner: Exile target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, protection from black Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy all creatures, then create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Knight of the White Orchid enters the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In these halls there is no pass or fail. Your true test comes with the first full moon."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) {X}: Until end of turn, creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X and gain all creature types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unaware of Lorwyn's diversity, it sees only itself, reflected a thousand times over.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, create a 3/3 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her angry call split the sky. From that rift descended her champions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a creature you control dies, sacrifice Promise of Bunrei. If you do, create four 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not afraid to die today nor afraid of what death will bring."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Sacrifice Remorseful Cleric: Exile target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lifetime of keeping up appearances is not enough to earn an eternity of rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {1}{U}: Return target Spirit you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The restless geists of common folk often continue their lifelong labors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The arc of my blade has carved a path of light for the peace that will follow."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature token leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Twilight Drover. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Twilight Drover: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her voice is justice, clear and relentless." - Akroma, angelic avenger

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oona's song is like a twisted dinner chime. All the faeries return home, but it is Oona who feasts - on the stolen dreams and rumors they serve her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. If you return four or more nontoken permanents you control this way, you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have wept such a torrent as to scour the land clean." - Mu Yanling

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ghostly Pilferer becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card. Whenever an opponent casts a spell from anywhere other than their hand, draw a card. Discard a card: Ghostly Pilferer can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only one vault was great enough to hold Emrakul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He's a lot like me, that masterless little kami . . . unimpressed by grandeur and never at a loss for a trick." - Toshiro Umezawa

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U}. {2}{U}: Put an hour counter on Midnight Clock. At the beginning of each upkeep, put an hour counter on Midnight Clock. When the twelfth hour counter is put on Midnight Clock, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then draw seven cards. Exile Midnight Clock.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying Whenever Nebelgast Herald or another Spirit enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Rattlechains enters the battlefield, target Spirit gains hexproof until end of turn. You may cast Spirit spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The bonders work with creatures that fly, slink, and burrow. Assume they know everything." - Jirina Kudro

property.value: Flying Shacklegeist can block only creatures with flying. Tap two untapped Spirits you control: Tap target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Blessed Sleep doesn't come easily to a mind chained by regrets.

property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This storm blows gales through the dreams of mortals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying {3}{U}: Draw a card.

property.value: "Any ship that sails on these mean seas for long is bound to pick up a ghost or two." - Admiral Beckett Brass

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other Spirits you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A king's knowledge does not vanish when the heart stops beating.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, you may draw a card. {4}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here, there is only truth." - Barvisa, Azorius emissary

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So many have died in search of that map. And now it appears in the hands of the arrogant child Chandra Nalaar."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink When Bloodline Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may return target Vampire or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The veil of death hides little from our kind."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying Whenever you cast a Vampire creature spell, it gains bloodthirst 3.

property.value: Flying {B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodtracker. When Bloodtracker leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flee all you like. The further you run the more firmly I feel your heartbeat."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Champion of Dusk enters the battlefield, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Vampires you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drench these golden streets in the blood of our enemies."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Cordial Vampire or another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Please, come in! Hors d'oeuvres are on the table."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.

property.value: "Silumgar's mind is a dark labyrinth, full of grim secrets and subtle traps." - Siara, the Dragon's Mouth

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{B}{B}: Exile target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on Dark Impostor. Dark Impostor has all activated abilities of all creature cards exiled with it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ah, this is a nice life. I can see why you were so desperate to keep it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

property.value: Lifelink {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're not surrounded by decadence, my question to you is - why not?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, protection from white When Malakir Bloodwitch enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Vampires you control. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.value: "Jarad fancies himself king of the undercity, but he's merely king of rot."

property.value: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.value: "I have seen things that would reduce a weaker person to blubbering and raving. Want to hear about them?" - Vraska

property.value: Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}. {B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hate is an everlasting wellspring from which she is eternally sustained.

property.value: Whenever a Vampire you control attacks, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sanctum Seekers were the first of the knightly orders to cross the sea and are still the most zealous.

property.value: Discard a card: Vampires you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood from the vein is the finest vintage to accompany a feast of the mind." - Runo Stromkirk

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.

property.value: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You may tap any number of untapped Vampire creatures you control. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those Vampires.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As they fought the Eldrazi, many vampires learned to live among humans. Others were unable to make the adjustment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Anje's Ravager attacks each combat if able. Whenever Anje's Ravager attacks, discard your hand, then draw three cards. Madness {1}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Madness {X}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.) Avacyn's Judgment deals 2 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. If this spell's madness cost was paid, it deals X damage divided as you choose among those permanents and/or players instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield. Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

property.value: "Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything." - Thalia, Knight-Cathar

property.value: Flying Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My liege will lead and I will follow - to the battlefield, to the grave, and beyond."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The finest soldiers aren't worth a whit without a set of hands to lead them and a set of eyes to guide them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each Vampire creature card you own that isn't on the battlefield has madness. The madness cost is equal to its mana cost. (If you discard a card with madness, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Gain control of all creatures with power 4 or greater until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn. • Gain control of all creatures with power 3 or less until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Molten Echoes enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a nontoken creature of the chosen type enters the battlefield under your control, create a token that's a copy of that creature. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're not having fun, what's the point of living forever?"
